## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7e2f6eb6b2d571a457c452301694f5e1f6da8ff1254c78f6837eaef6af78134e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'epc-notification-setting-web' @ 66.6.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
